article_title: Health Insurance Companies See ObamaCare Medicaid Boon

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: As the Obama administration touts the need for uninsured Americans to sign up for private coverage via exchanges under the Affordable Care Act, the insurance industry sees growth in an expanded Medicaid program for the poor under the health law. This week, the chief executive of the nation’s largest health insurance [...]
